properties.name: 19grams Alex – Roastery & Lab
properties.description: Café & Roastery & Event Space, offering freshly roasted beans and Australian-inspired brunch, breakfast, and lunch. Free Wi-Fi, indoor/outdoor seating. Perfect for coffee enthusiasts and events. Open daily.

properties.name: The Greens - Coffee & Plants
properties.description: A cozy spot to relax, offering indoor and outdoor seating (plus a charming garden across the street for weekends). Delicious coffee and pastries. Not laptop-friendly; laptops allowed only outdoors.

properties.name: Röststätte
properties.description: Good coffee with plenty of outdoor seating. A relatively quiet corner of Berlin, perfect for relaxing and enjoying a cup after a long walk. They roast their own beans, so you can also buy their coffee to take home.

properties.name: Coffee Circle
properties.description: A charming and stylish café with delicious coffee, matcha, and desserts. There are spaces to work with your laptop and cozy spots to chat with friends. When it's warm, you can sit outside. Card payments only. They roast their own beans, so you can buy their coffee to take home.

properties.name: The Barn Café
properties.description: The first The Barn, opened in 2010, marked Germany's intro to the third wave coffee movement. Lovingly called "Baby Barn", it's perfect for cozying up with a book or chatting with friends. Skilled baristas offer weekly rotating filter choices for fresh coffee.
